988 mental health crisis line adds sign language services  —  The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) announced on Friday that it would be adding American Sign Language Services (ASL) to the government's 988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline as part of efforts to expand behavioral health care services for underserved groups.
